im trying to mount a usb key ; not havin: /dev/sda isn't availale, how does ubuntu handle it
in theory it should be fully automatic.
first check what 'lsusb' says to make sure the device is recognized.
then check 'cat /proc/scsi/scsi' to see if it is there at all.
Bus 002 Device 003: ID 08ec:0010 M-Systems Flash Disk Pioneers DiskOnKey
on IRC you should not paste more than 3-4 lines.
in theory 'modprobe usb-storage' should work, but that should have been done automatically by hotplug etc.
if you want to be helped in general respect IRC rules. Else you will get kicked or banned from channels...
